title: AI Cancer Detection System Identifies Tumors 5 Years Before Symptoms
introText: A groundbreaking AI system developed by Google Health can now detect cancer up to five years before symptoms appear. Clinical trials show 94% accuracy in early detection, potentially saving millions of lives through early intervention.

content.content: The AI system analyzes blood biomarkers, imaging data, and medical history to detect cancer up to five years before conventional diagnosis. Accuracy reaches 94% for 12 cancer types.
Machine learning algorithms identify subtle patterns in routine blood tests that indicate early tumor development. The system flags patients for further testing before tumors become visible on scans.
Early-stage cancers are far more treatable. If deployed widely, the technology could prevent millions of cancer deaths annually. FDA approval is expected by mid-2026.

summary: Google Health's AI system detects cancer up to five years before symptoms, with 94% accuracy, potentially saving millions of lives.
